Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

Class DiscountedPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.DiscountedPlayer
public class DiscountedPlayer
extends Player
The type Discounted player (it extends Player). It's the player with a Discount LeaderCard.
